simple.gui

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.Widget
      • simple.gui.Button

  • public class Button
extends Widget
    Widget object. Creates a clickable button, intended to be tied to an event. Changes colour according to current widget status.

    TODO: create functionality for method attachment.

    • Field Detail

      • clrRatio

        protected float clrRatio
        Colour fullness displayed. A value of 1 means the rgb values will be displayed at 100%. A value of 0.5 means rgb values of 50%.

      • imageBox

        protected ImageBox imageBox
        Image displayed on the button's background.

      • textLabel

        protected Label textLabel
